FIRST_BLOCK.title: No More Complications, Start Using Now
FIRST_BLOCK.subtitle: Save time, gain more clients, and simplify your business management with {{systemName}}!

SECOND_BLOCK.title: Online Scheduling for Your Business
SECOND_BLOCK.subtitle: With {{systemName}}, you can create and manage your appointments simply and efficiently.

THIRD_BLOCK.title: No More Frustration with Bad Platforms
THIRD_BLOCK.subtitle: With {{systemName}}, you can sign up and start using right away! Without having to deal with a pesky sales team.

PAGE_HEADER_CTA.title: Simplify your bookings
PAGE_HEADER_CTA.subtitle: Subscribe to our platform and streamline the scheduling of your services.

HERO_DESCRIPTION: Organize and schedule appointments with ease using our intuitive platform. No hassle - just mark, schedule, and organize.
HOW_TO_USE_STEP_1: Go to Create Appointment and enter client, service, and provider data. Choose a day and time and confirm on the next screen. Then simply check on the appointments screen.
HOW_TO_USE_STEP_2: Use the toolbar to access additional features like service management, professionals, business hours, and more.
FEATURES_DESCRIPTION: Discover the powerful features that make our platform the best choice for your appointments.
FEATURE_1_DESCRIPTION: Join our platform and start offering your services by appointment to a wide customer base.
FEATURE_2_DESCRIPTION: Schedule beauty, wellness, and healthcare services with qualified and experienced professionals.
FEATURE_3_DESCRIPTION: Become a Belezix professional and earn extra income by offering beauty services.
COOKIE_NOTICE: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site.
COOKIE_PREFERENCES_DESCRIPTION: Manage your cookie settings. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.
ESSENTIAL_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off.
ANALYTICS_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve the performance of our site.
MARKETING_COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: These cookies help us display relevant ads to you.
HOW_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: See how easy it is to use our scheduling platform.
FIND_PROVIDER_DESC: Search for service providers in your area.
SCHEDULE_SERVICE_DESC: Choose the date and time that best suit your needs.
SERVICE_PERFORMED_DESC: The service provider performs the service as scheduled.
